Daniela Burnaz

Game Developer

Hi! I'm Daniela

I'm a web developer, designer, and space enthusiast who mixes code with creativity.

I've built sleek websites, mentored budding designers, interned in robotics, and helped in satellite projects.

Whether it's crafting intuitive interfaces, experimenting with game design, or crafting award-winning MVPs at hackathons with my teammates, I love turning ideas into things people can see, click, and enjoy.

P.S. I like giving hugs 🤗

Projects

Estonian Student Satellite

Worked on all consumer-facing designs: rollups, social-media posts, posters, and online appearance.

Babol

Shoot bubbles at mosquitoes and defeat their queen! I made the art and pair programmed in Godot.

IFC Troll

I designed the interface of IFCTroll in a way that even people with non-technical backgrounds could choose connectors for their construction projects

SketchSphere network

Social network built with Go (backend) and with Next.JS (frontend). It features user authentication with sessions and cookies

NoodleStop

Full-Stack Java Web E-Commerce Application.

Clipster

AI-generated flashcards app for studying based on pdf/text input
